meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Roberta Hyman Addison Goodson Gary Walters Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2083.

td.p: Roberta Hyman, a manufacturer from Atlantic City, New Jersey
Addison Goodson, a jobs training coordinator from Venice, California
Gary Walters, an entertainment attorney originally from New York City, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $9,250)

tr.td: HISTORIC NAMES
POP LYRICS
FAMOUS FIRSTS
COUNTIES
ACES
EIGHTS

H

GaryAddison
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_2_3', 'clue_J_2_3_stuck', '(Addison: What is um, the, uh, "The Night Billie Joe MacAllister Jumped Off the Tallahassee Bridge, Tallahatchie Bridge?"
[Laughter.]
...
(Alex: I don\'t think Billie Joe MacAllister jumped off; he threw something off.)

[After the break Alex clarified that Addison was right about Billie Joe later jumping off the bridge.]

"Ode to Billie Joe"

Addison
Triple Stumper
')

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
